product_name: Sweet Spot Skirts Team Sweet Spot Bike Skirt
long_description: Can you dig it? The retro flower-power Team Sweet Spot Bike Skirt from Sweet Spot Skirts adds bold design and modest coverage over your bike shorts, running shorts, workout tights and swimwear. Wear the all-cotton skirt over tights, leggings or shorts on bike rides or runs, and before or after yoga class or a plunge in the pool. Reversible design gives you 2 skirts in one. Wrap skirt secures with a double row of snaps and can be adjusted to fit sizes 2 - 14. Sweet Spot Skirts Team Sweet Spot Bike Skirt is designed for wearing on the hips, not at the waist.
short_description: Can you dig it? The retro flower-power Team Sweet Spot Bike Skirt from Sweet Spot Skirts adds bold design and modest coverage over your bike shorts, running shorts, workout tights and swimwear.
